name: 2nd Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies
content: We are very excited to invite participants from all over the world to “2nd Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies” (ICTM 2021) organized at Paris, France on September 24-25, 2021 with theme "Cure with Nature". ICTM is global platform to update and exchange the knowledge and expertise on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies. Join us to preserve, promote and strengthen the nature based healing strategies and its magical cure. ICTM 2021 consists of a lecture, presentation, workshop, and seminars from the experts, doctors, professors, dedicated professionals, scientists and young scholars. For scientific sessions please see: https://traditional-medicine-conferences.magnusgroup.org/program/scientific-sessions For Abstract submission PS: https://traditional-medicine-conferences.magnusgroup.org/submit-abstract For Registration PS: https://traditional-medicine-conferences.magnusgroup.org/register
